alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 4:25PM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 13 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, with near blizzard conditions possible. Winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven
